text: Francia was a kingdom founded in 481 AD. It may also be called the Kingdom of the Franks, Frankish Kingdom, or Frankish Empire. It was first a province of the Western Roman Empire founded by Clovis I. Before that it was a Germanic state. After the Treaty of Verdun in 843, West Francia became the predecessor of France, and East Francia became that of Germany. Category:Former monarchies of Europe Category:5th-century establishments in Europe Category:480s establishments Category:840s disestablishments
title: Francia
